sentences.en: Candidates must satisfy the general conditions for admission.
sentences.cn: 候选人必须满足参选的总体条件。

sentences.en: Cheap goods are available, but not in sufficient quantities to satisfy demand.
sentences.cn: 有一些廉价的商品，但是数量不足以满足需求。

sentences.en: He had to satisfy all claims for the damage he had caused.
sentences.cn: 他必须赔偿他造成的所有损失.

sentences.en: He tried hard to satisfy me of his sincerity.
sentences.cn: 他竭力让我了解他的诚意.

sentences.en: He wanted to satisfy himself that he had given his best performance.
sentences.cn: 他想说服自己他已经发挥到极致了。

sentences.en: In practice, workers do not work to satisfy their needs.
sentences.cn: 事实上，工人工作并不是为了满足本身的需要。

sentences.en: Nothing I did would ever satisfy my father.
sentences.cn: 我做什么都不能让父亲满意。

sentences.en: She is too poor to satisfy her family's material needs.
sentences.cn: 她太穷了,无法满足家人的物质需要.

sentences.en: She skipped normal meals to satisfy her craving for chocolate and crisps.
sentences.cn: 她不吃正餐,以便满足自己吃巧克力和炸薯片的渴望.

sentences.en: The pace of change has not been quick enough to satisfy everyone.
sentences.cn: 变化的速度还不够快，不能让所有人都满意。

sentences.en: The procedures should satisfy certain basic requirements.
sentences.cn: 这些程序应该符合某些基本要求。

sentences.en: The scandal stories satisfy people's curiosity for a few hours.
sentences.cn: 有关丑闻的报道使人们的好奇心在几个小时内得到满足。

sentences.en: They are there only to satisfy their ghoulish curiosity.
sentences.cn: 他们去那里纯粹是为了满足其病态的好奇心。

sentences.en: To satisfy our own curiosity we traveled to Baltimore.
sentences.cn: 为了满足好奇心，我们去了巴尔的摩。

sentences.en: We can satisfy our basic wants more easily than in the past.
sentences.cn: 现在我们的基本需求可以比过去更容易得到满足。

sentences.en: We just can't find enough good second-hand cars to satisfy demand.
sentences.cn: 我们实在找不到足够多的性能良好的二手车，满足不了需求。

words.tran_cn: 满意的；符合要求的；赎罪的
可以满足的；可使满足的
令人满意的；令人满足的
满意，满足；赔偿；乐事；赎罪
使满意,满足;符合;使高兴

trans.tran_en: to make someone feel pleased by doing what they want

trans.tran_cn: 满足， 使满意； 使确信， 使弄清楚； 符合， 达到； 清偿， 还清债务
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel pleased by doing what they want
